channel.title: Car insurance!
channel.description:
So, I have a shitty car waiting for me outside my house.
Ford KA 1.1L 1998 (R reg) 42,000 miles Manual Petrol.
Car value: £995
I just got off the phone too direct line, and they offered £7,236 annually.
FUCKING RIP OFF! Insurance is 7x more than the car is worth!

item.title: Car insurance!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:11, topic:391760”]Car insurance is just too keep the cops away from you ass.

^^ True.[/quote]Car insurance is so when you get in a wreck it’s covered. For your car or the other person’s.

Read full topic

item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Go compareeeee.

Read full topic

item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

LOLOL. Yea I dont have car insurance. Fuck that.

Read full topic

item.title: Car insurance!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Yeah, what Evil_ said is the honest truth. There is no way you will get a fair quote if you are under ~25. My parents insure my car though, luckily.

Read full topic

item.title: Car insurance!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

See if you have a family auto car insurance company near where you live. I am 22, and only pay about $450.

Tip: If you have more than one car, or a mortgage as well having all of them on the same insurance you get a lot of discounts.

Read full topic

Protip: get gender reassignment surgery and fake proof of age and you’ll be paying £500.

item.title: Car insurance!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:3, topic:391760”][quote author=mark033 link=topic=488924.msg3574335#msg3574335 date=1303302861]
I wonder how old you are…


[/quote]
wtf?[/quote]
are you retarded? You are obviously a 17-18 male so there’s no surprise at all that you’ve been quoted 7 grand for insurance. I have friends that have been quoted even worse…

Protip: get gender reassignment surgery and fake proof of age and you’ll be paying £500.

Read full topic

item.title: Car insurance!
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“AssualtX, post:18, topic:391760”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=488924.msg3574374#msg3574374 date=1303304171]

[quote author=AssualtX link=topic=488924.msg3574372#msg3574372 date=1303304098]

I’ll probably end up killing myself on the road, but I’ll do it legally.
[/quote]not a great thought

What would I care, young, dumb and living life?
[/quote]Still the thought of death isnt a nice thing look at the brighter things like the sun
or the light on the roof of your bedroom XD[/quote]

Or the light leading to heaven.

I joke, I love life at the moment but this is just one big downfall of being a teenager that’s legal too drive!

Read full topic

item.title: Car insurance!
item.dc:creator: @AssualtX AssualtX
item.description:
@AssualtX wrote:

Lawl i like it. car insurance made simple just ask TabbyKiller:

TabbyKiller:

Whats there to know? You buy a car, pay for all the shit you need to get that sticker on your front window and away you go.

[quote=“Saphire`, post:11, topic:391760”]Car insurance is just too keep the cops away from you ass.

^^ True.[/quote]
True
